description.english: Survive through a whole game in Casual Mode.
description.spanish: Sobrevive una partida completa en el modo Casual.
description.russian: Пройдите всю игру в легком режиме.
description.schinese: 在休闲模式中完成一整局游戏。
description.german: Überlebe ein ganzes Spiel im Modus "Locker".
description.french: Survivez à une partie en mode Tranquille.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva a todo o jogo no Modo Casual.

description.english: Survive through a whole game in Normal Mode.
description.spanish: Sobrevive una partida completa en el modo Normal.

description.schinese: 在普通模式中完成一整局游戏。
description.german: Überlebe ein ganzes Spiel im Modus "Normal".

description.brazilian: Sobreviva a todo o jogo no Modo Normal.

description.english: Survive through a whole game in Hard Mode.

description.brazilian: Sobreviva a todo o jogo no Modo Perito.
